name: ZOOMBIE SHOOTER V 1.0
description:

NEW UPDATE of the top down shooter  this new version contains:  - map update and zombie bug fixes  - The artificial intelligence of the zoombies has been implemented  -The sound was added to the shot  - The counter of killed zoombies has been added  - next update scheduled by 15/08/2019
